fixed_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to 1 foe equal to 121.7/127.8/133.9% of Attack. 67.6/71.0/74.4% chance to inflict Shock for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Ziodyne

innate_skill.desc: 16.3/17.1/17.9% chance to inflict Dizzy on all foes for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Nocturnal Flash

innate_skill.desc: Restores 6.0% of max HP and 8 SP when ambushing.
innate_skill.name: Heat Up III

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 10.5%. After using an Electric skill on 1 foe, deal bonus Electric damage equal to 37% of Attack.
passive_skill.name: Wrathful Thunder

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 10.5%. After using an Electric skill on 1 foe, deal bonus Electric damage equal to 51% of Attack.
